channel.title: =DRGPvP= Where PK'ing and PvM'ing go HEAD TO HEAD
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys, Kryptic/Trevor here. I am just going to do a quick and simple advertisment(: I hope to see the playerbase growing on DRGPvP! Yes I know it looks like any other "InsidiaX" based server, but this is better!
[size=large][b]Features:[/b][/size] Custom Dungeoneering Npc Clipping 80% Summoning Penguins Donator Tokens -- Takes place of donator points Archery Tickets -- Another new currency -- 85% Stable Eco Dicing Stable source CUSTOM ITEMS Gano Steads Glaivens CUSTOM SHOPS Fixed deadlocks Fixed memleaks Fixed most dupes 24/7 VPS hosted [b][size=large]Media:[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zdyzit.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/ekhleb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0xylk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2wq4ccx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ljjgqb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24vu1ll.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/22bbf9867cd92ad8f8b102f73c535f3c[/img]
[size=large][b]Links:[/b][/size] Webclient : http://www.drgpvp.com/play.html Website/Forums : http://forums.drgpvp.com [/center]

item.title: =DRGPvP= Where PK'ing and PvM'ing go HEAD TO HEAD
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“lol space, post:3, topic:536608”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=655421.msg4388103#msg4388103 date=1386455613]
Server was offline when i tried to login
[/quote]
Yeah. I updated a bunch of sstuff. Its a bit different now, try the webclient now:)[/quote]

Webclient does not work.

Read full topic

item.title: =DRGPvP= Where PK'ing and PvM'ing go HEAD TO HEAD
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

[center]Hey guys, Kryptic/Trevor here. I am just going to do a quick and simple advertisment(: I hope to see the playerbase growing on DRGPvP! Yes I know it looks like any other “InsidiaX” based server, but this is better!

[size=large]Features:[/size]
Custom Dungeoneering
Npc Clipping 80%
Summoning
Penguins
Donator Tokens – Takes place of donator points
Archery Tickets – Another new currency – 85%
Stable Eco
Dicing
Stable source
CUSTOM ITEMS
Gano
Steads
Glaivens
CUSTOM SHOPS
Fixed deadlocks
Fixed memleaks
Fixed most dupes
24/7 VPS hosted
[size=large]Media:[/size]






[size=large]Links:[/size]
Webclient : http://www.drgpvp.com/play.html
Website/Forums : http://forums.drgpvp.com
[/center]
